'''Videos''' are released to highlight ''[[Genshin Impact]]''{{'}}s story and characters. They are typically uploaded to Genshin Impact's [https://www.youtube.com/c/GenshinImpact official YouTube channel].

==Types==
===Character===
These videos are released alongside a new character, usually in this order.
* [[Character Teaser]]: a teaser for an upcoming 5-star character, relating to their story or personality
* [[Character Demo]]: a short preview of a character's animations and skills
* [[Collected Miscellany]]: an in-depth demonstration and explanation of a character's skills, typically narrated by [[Dainsleif]] or [[Alice]]

===Story===
* [[Story Teaser]]: cutscenes and cinematics from quests
* [[Teyvat Chapter Storyline Preview: Travail]]
* [[Teyvat Chapter Interlude Teaser: A Winter Night's Lazzo]]

===Soundtrack===
{{Main|Soundtrack/Media}}
* [[Soundtrack/Media#Soundtrack Videos|Soundtrack Videos]]: the soundtracks posted on YouTube
* [[Soundtrack/Media#Recorded Performance|Recorded Performance]]: official performances of the soundtrack
** [[Genshin Concert]]
* [[Extended Play]]: a selection of soundtracks, often relating to a specific character

===Version===
* [[Special Program]]: a broadcast highlighting the features of an upcoming version
* [[Version Trailer]]: a short trailer included in the Special Program

===Other===
* [[Outfit Teaser]]: videos highlighting a new [[Character Outfit]]
* [[Short Trailer]]: videos highlighting stories for [[character]]s
* [[Gourmet Tour]]: videos highlighting certain recipes
* [[Developer Insight#Videos|Developer Insight]]: videos relating to the process of creating the game, including character design, enemy design, and soundtrack design
